nodes.text: Bennbus Polag was an Arcona entrepreneur and criminal. Starting off by picking pockets and scamming others off their wealth, Polag moved onto to running guns, fencing items, and even operating a salt mine. Eventually, he settled into a respectable role in local government on a backwater planet. Polag was responsible for the capture of Alliance agent Nallok with the intent of handing her over to the Galactic Empire.
